TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the forum is overwhelmed with furies.

I wish people just accepted some guys like ponies.

Granted, but people stop accepting that some girls like ponies.

I wish for a cure for procrastination.

Granted,everything gets hacked,even the toilets

I wish that Bronies & Furries disappear.

granted but bronies stay around...

I wish for more people to join the herd

Granted, they all become horses, not bronies

i wish for a prehensile tail.

Granted, you became a primate

I wish for telekeinesis

Edited October 30, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Granted, but your maximum range is 1 nm (about 5 atom radii) from your body.

I wish for KSP weekly to have an exact release schedule.

Granted,but KSP weekly stops postingw before the schedule is released

I wish that I was sucked into KSP

Granted,but you die.

I wish i had a Corgi.

Granted, TheAttackCorgi

I wish to have long range telekinesis

Granted, but the maximum force you can apply is 1x10^-6 Newton.

I wish for all economists in the world to understand unlimited growth within a limited system is not possible.

Edited October 30, 2013 by OrtwinS

Granted, but they realize you were the one who found out and you are stalked by them for the rest of your life.

I wish for an Electronic Thumb.

This thing's still going? O.o

Granted, but a short-circuit leaves the nerves of your entire arm fried and useless. You'll never use the arm again.

I wish Windows 8.1 would just install alreadyÃ¢â‚¬â€¹.

Yes but a virus freezes your computer.

I want a box full of space...

Granted, explosive decompression.

I wish to have a mun base

Granted, you must now deliver it to the mun.

I wish for a lyra plush. Not the NSFW one.

like this ?

I wish for stuffs

Granted, nasty stuffs

I wish for fallout : Equestria
Granted, but it means you have to put your hand in his butt for a prostate check

Wtf? You replyed to what?

(Nevermind, I'm watching you, don't touble my experiment)
this got awkward

there are NFSW toys? What the hell?!

Granted, it's even more awkward

I wish I could actually breathe properly out of my halloween ninja home-made costume

Granted. You get transported to the future and miss Halloween.

I wish for better processing power.

Granted, your computer is ploting to kill you

I wish to have an hal 9000 computer in a jar

Granted, this happens

(WARNING Strong language)

The last bit in Particular.

I wish Bendy Cartilage hooves were canon.
